keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposed Labour's plan to scrap maternity services at the Conquest, worked with local activists to ensure they were saved.
Campaigned for better schools for children and strongly supports Conservative education plans to give parents and teachers more say.
Fought against local kids being let down by Labour, campaigned for better payment terms from the council and improved parking for customers.

issues.education: Campaigned for better schools for our children, strongly supports Conservative education plans.
issues.health: Opposed Labour's plan to scrap maternity services at the Conquest, ensured they were saved.
